title: Chronos
summary: Generate interactive timelines for any region in history with AI-powered research
description: Natural language queries like 'Roman Empire 27 BCE - 476 CE' generate comprehensive timelines
Multi-source pipeline: Groq LLM for narrative, Wikidata SPARQL for structured data, Wikipedia for enrichment
Interactive map view with event markers, animated timeline playback, and citation-backed event cards
Real-time streaming generation with deduplication across 3 data sources

title: DocuLaw AI
summary: Translate dense legal contracts into plain English with side-by-side comparison
description: Upload legal documents and get plain-English explanations of complex clauses
Side-by-side diff viewer showing original legalese vs. simplified translation
AI chat interface for asking follow-up questions about specific sections

title: Product Page Reviewer
summary: Analyze any product page for conversion optimization with 50+ UX heuristics
description: Paste a URL and get a structured UX/conversion audit with actionable recommendations
Scores 50+ signals: CTA placement, pricing visibility, trust badges, social proof, accessibility
Context-aware scoring adapts weights for Ecommerce vs. SaaS vs. B2B vs. Service sites
FastAPI backend with BeautifulSoup scraping, React frontend with detailed breakdowns

title: KOSMOS Website
summary: Archive of 10+ years of dance org history with member bios and performance galleries
description: Componentized gallery system for photos, videos, and performance archives
Dynamic roster pages with member bios across multiple generations
Mobile-responsive design with optimized image loading for large galleries

title: Diffusion Models
summary: Custom diffusion sampling with inpainting, text-conditioning, and classifier-free guidance
description: Implemented DDPM sampling loops from scratch with configurable noise schedules
Built inpainting pipeline for masked image completion using pretrained models
Text-to-image generation with CLIP embeddings and classifier-free guidance
Explored latent space interpolation and style transfer between prompts

title: Hybrid Images
summary: Images that change appearance at different viewing distances using frequency separation
description: Gaussian low-pass filtering to extract coarse structure, Laplacian high-pass for fine detail
Blended frequency bands to create images that morph when you squint or step back
Multiresolution blending for seamless composites using Laplacian pyramids
FFT analysis to visualize and tune frequency cutoffs

title: Colorizing Historical Imagery
summary: Automated alignment and colorization of Prokudin-Gorskii glass plate photographs
description: Aligned RGB glass plate negatives from 1900s Russian photography archives
Multi-scale image pyramid for efficient alignment of high-resolution scans
Normalized cross-correlation and L2 matching to handle exposure differences
Automatic border cropping and contrast optimization for final output

title: Asthma & AQI Analysis
summary: Statistical analysis of air quality impact on asthma hospitalization rates
description: Analyzed correlation between county-level AQI data and asthma ER visit rates
Linear regression modeling with confidence intervals and hypothesis testing
Data cleaning and merging across EPA air quality and CA health datasets
Visualizations showing geographic and temporal patterns in respiratory health

title: PASAE Website
summary: Redesigned student org website with modern UI and improved navigation
description: Led website redesign for Philippine American engineering student organization
Restructured information architecture for easier event discovery
Mobile-first responsive design with improved load times

title: Toxic Speech Detection
summary: NLP classifier for detecting and categorizing toxic speech patterns on Twitter
description: Built text classification pipeline using NLTK for preprocessing and feature extraction
Experimented with TF-IDF, word embeddings, and transformer-based approaches
Explored dataset bias and class imbalance challenges in hate speech detection

title: Pacman AI Agent
summary: Search algorithms and reinforcement learning for game-playing AI agents
description: Implemented DFS, BFS, UCS, and A* search for pathfinding in maze environments
Built Minimax and Expectimax agents for adversarial ghost avoidance
Applied Q-Learning and Value Iteration for learned decision-making policies
Achieved >90% win rate on benchmark mazes through heuristic tuning

title: RISC-V CPU
summary: 5-stage pipelined processor with hazard detection and forwarding
description: Designed complete RISC-V datapath: IF, ID, EX, MEM, WB stages
Implemented data hazard detection with register forwarding to minimize stalls
Built control hazard handling with branch prediction and pipeline flushing
Simulated and debugged in Logisim with comprehensive test coverage

title: Gitlet
summary: Git clone with commits, branches, merging, and persistent storage
description: Implemented core Git commands: init, add, commit, checkout, branch, merge
SHA-1 content addressing for blob and commit deduplication
Persistent object storage with serialization to .gitlet directory
Three-way merge with automatic conflict detection and marking

title: Solar Water Heating Analysis
summary: Performance modeling of solar thermal systems using LBNL weather data
description: Analyzed LBNL's Multiscale Solar Water Heating simulation outputs
Visualized energy consumption vs. solar fraction tradeoffs across climates
Generated heatmaps to identify optimal system configurations
Presented findings to research team for residential deployment decisions
